about.name: Youssef Brahim
about.summary: I create user-centric designs by conducting thorough user research and crafting intuitive experiences through wireframing, prototyping, and iterative testing. I collaborate closely with stakeholders and team members to ensure successful implementation and aim to create impactful user experiences with compelling visual interfaces.
